characterDescription:
Oroden is the young son of Lirin and Hesina, and baby brother to Kaladin. His name means "child of peace." Kaladin thinks this is a very good name. Holding the child, hugging him tight, Kaladin cannot stop his tears from flowing.
Oroden is described as being a toddler, perhaps a year old, chewing on his hand, and babbling around his fingers.
